data.name: UnsupportedLanguageVersionTitle
data.value: C# language version not supported by the source generator.

data.name: UnsupportedLanguageVersionMessageFormat
data.value: The CompositeKey source generator does not support C# {0}. Please use language version {1} or greater.

data.name: UnsupportedCompositeTypeTitle
data.value: The type annotated with the 'CompositeKey' attribute is not supported.

data.name: UnsupportedCompositeTypeMessageFormat
data.value: The 'CompositeKey' type '{0}' is not currently supported, at present, only record types are supported.

data.name: CompositeTypeMustBePartialTitle
data.value: The type annotated wth the 'CompositeKey' attribute must be partial.

data.name: CompositeTypeMustBePartialMessageFormat
data.value: The 'CompositeKey' type '{0}' (and all containing types) must be partial to kick off source generation.

data.name: NoObviousDefaultConstructorTitle
data.value: The type annotated with the 'CompositeKey' attribute has no obvious constructor.

data.name: NoObviousDefaultConstructorMessageFormat
data.value: The 'CompositeKey' type '{0}' has no obvious constructor, at present, only types with either a single constructor or types with a parameterless constructor are supported.

data.name: EmptyOrInvalidTemplateStringTitle
data.value: The `TemplateString` provided to the 'CompositeKey' attribute is invalid.

data.name: EmptyOrInvalidTemplateStringMessageFormat
data.value: The 'TemplateString' of '{0}' is either empty or could not be successfully parsed.

data.name: PrimaryKeySeparatorMissingFromTemplateStringTitle
data.value: The 'PrimaryKeySeparator' provided to the 'CompositeKey' attribute is unused.

data.name: PrimaryKeySeparatorMissingFromTemplateStringMessageFormat
data.value: The 'TemplateString' of '{0}' does not use the configured 'PrimaryKeySeparator' of '{1}' so it failed validation.

data.name: PropertyMustHaveAccessibleGetterAndSetterTitle
data.value: Property used in 'TemplateString' must have accessible get/set methods.

data.name: PropertyMustHaveAccessibleGetterAndSetterMessageFormat
data.value: The property '{0}' is missing either a setter or getter, this is not supported the property must have both accessible set/get methods.

data.name: PropertyHasInvalidOrUnsupportedFormatTitle
data.value: Property used in 'TemplateString' has invalid or unsupported format specifier.

data.name: PropertyHasInvalidOrUnsupportedFormatMessageFormat
data.value: The property '{0}' uses format '{1}' which is either invalid for the properties type or unsupported by the 'CompositeKey' source generator.
